about_the_game:
Track Masters Pro is a fast-paced racing game that combines realistic physics, exciting races and extensive customization options. Choose one of five unique cars, customize their appearance with dozens of available elements and improve their characteristics to achieve maximum performance on the track. Compete against advanced artificial intelligence that adapts to your driving style. The controls are intuitive, but it will take practice and precision to become a master on the track.

Are you ready to become a true master of racing?

Game Features:

- 5 unique cars with different characteristics and driving style.

- Full customization: change the appearance of cars, add skins, spoilers, wheels and more.

- Performance Enhancement: Upgrade engine, brakes, suspension and more to improve performance.

- Race mode against AI: Compete against intelligent and adaptive artificial intelligence.

- Realistic physics: feel every movement of the car thanks to the advanced physics model.

- Competitive atmosphere: participate in tournaments, earn medals and climb the leaderboard.

- Diverse tracks: Race through scenic locations, from city streets to mountain serpentines.

name: Track Masters Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Track Masters Pro is a realistic racing simulator where you can choose from 5 unique cars with full external customization and upgrades. Compete with artificial intelligence. Show your skills on the track and become the best racer!
